Verckys Kiamuangana Mateta (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 19 Mee, n'afọ 1944, Kinshasa, Zaire - 13 Ọktoba 2022) bụ onye egwu (nke bụ isi saxophonist), onye na-ede egwu, onye isi otu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, na onye isi azụmahịa egwu na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC).  Ọ bụ ezie na a ma ya ama dị ka onye na-eti egwu nwere nkà ma na-eme nke ọma, ọ ga-abụ na ọ bụ onye ama karịa dị ka "onye Afrịka mbụ nwere akara ndekọ" na maka iwebata ọtụtụ ndị isi egwu Congo na ụwa site na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Veve ya na akara ya.
A mụrụ ya dị ka Georges Kiamuangana
O si n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya; nna ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego na Leopoldville (nke bụ Kinshasa ugbu a)
Dị ka onye saxophonist, ọ nakweere aha Verckys dabere na onye na-egwu saxophone nke America bụ King Curtis, na-anụ aha "Curtis" dị ka "Verckys".
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo afọ 1980s.
N'afọ 1969, Verckys Kiamuangana hapụrụ TPOK Jazz wee guzobe otu egwu ya, Orchestre Vévé
Verkys chịkwara ìgwè abụọ ọzọ, nke o nwere: Orchestre Kiam na Orchestre Lipua Lipua
N'ime ndị egwu na-egwuri egwu maka Verkys n'afọ ndị 1970 bụ Nyboma Mwandido na Pepe Kalle
N'oge mmalite afọ 1980 Verckys kwụsịrị egwu egwu, iji chụsoo ọdịmma ndị ọzọ.
N'afọ 2015, Sterns Music wepụtara na MP3 ụdị ọtụtụ n'ime mmepụta nke akara ndekọ nke Verckys's Éditions Vévé (post blọọgụ na-ekwupụta nke a gụnyere akụkọ ndụ nke Verckys).
